main_error: Something went wrong, please try again later. If the issue consistents please contact support team.
main_share_msg: Trifecta Yum is a fun AI Recipe app!!
main_question_1: What would you like to do?
get_recipe_ingredient_4_leave_blank: leave it blank if you don't have 4th ingredient
get_recipe_ingredient_5_leave_blank: leave it blank if you don't have 5th ingredient
get_recipe_any_allergy_leave_blank: leave it blank if you don't have allergy
get_recipe_special_diet_leave_blank: leave it blank if you don't have special diet
get_recipe_duplicate_error: Error: Duplicate ingredients are not allowed
get_recipe_low_cookies_warning: You are running low on cookies, please top up to request more recipes from Chef Girofy.
settings_help_faq_answer1: Cookies are the amount of AI process time to consume and generate your recipe based on your prompt. One recipe session takes an average of 300 cookies.
settings_delete_account_msg: Once an account is deleted, you won't be able to recover the cookies and recipes data you own. Are you sure to proceed?
settings_delete_account_msg_2: Sorry to see you leave. Your account has been deleted.
merchant_purchase_error: Something went wrong the purchase failed to process, please try again later. If the issue consistents please contact support team.
merchant_purchase_success_msg: Boost complete! Profile has been refreshed!
recipe_collection_no_data_msg: No data found. Go ask Chef Girofy for recipe!
first_time_login_greet_msg_2: To start, you get 3000 cookies for free. Cookies are the token you exchange for recipes with Chef Girofy. Example: 1 Recipe may require 300 cookies depending on the complexity of the recipe you prompt.
first_time_login_greet_msg_3: Before we start, let's add a avatar and a nickname for later recipe sharing to the Internet!
first_time_login_nickname_error: You enter a nickname but it's not valid, please try again till you see a green checkmark
